Package org.opt4j.operators.algebra

package org.opt4j.operators.algebra

Provides the classes for the algebra operator for genotypes. This operator performs simple linear algebra to to double vectors. The Algebra operator can only be applied to vectors of doubles, thus, the DoubleGenotype.

See Also:

  • DoubleGenotype
